programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert and the Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert and the Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep51
programme.desc: Rupert Saves Christmas - While riding his sleigh in the sky towards the North Pole on Christmas Eve, Crinkle the snow elf falls & lands in Nutwood. Worried about the fact Santa won't be able to deliver any presents without him Rupert & friends help Crinkle attract Santa's attention in the sky by building a huge magical daisy chain. It begins to fall apart as Crinkle climbs up high and so the gang decorate a magical Christmas tree that can be seen from the sky. As they hear santa's sleigh approaching crinkle climbs the tree & is reunites with Santa ensuring all presents are delivered on Christmas day.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep52
programme.desc: Rupert and the Snow Key - Jack Frost has misplaced his Snow Key which unlocks the Spring. Without the key it will be snowy & Winter in Nutwood forever. Rupert & friends search Nutwood to help find the key unknowing Raggety has found the special key & is keeping it very safe. Will the gang find it in time & unlock Spring in time for the flowers & plants in Nutwood?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep49
programme.desc: What's That Green Hairy Stuff? - Jess and the puppies find some strange green hairy stuff growing under the water barrel. The puppies are scared of it and Jess promises them that he'll find out what it is at once. Hey, that's the big question! Jess thinks the green hairy stuff might be grass. He goes to ask Baa, who's a grass expert. Baa, Billie and Jess compare the green hairy stuff and ordinary grass using Billie's magnifying glass. It isn't grass but it is a plant. Mimi knows all about plants so they go to ask her about the green hairy stuff. She shows them the green hairy tops of carrots but they aren't like Jess's green hairy stuff either. Mimi's sure she's seen this green hairy stuff in other places around the farm. Jess thinks they should look around and see where it grows. There's green hairy stuff growing all over the farm in cool, damp places. Horace knows all about damp cool places. Perhaps he can help! Horace tells them that the green hairy stuff is a plant called moss and it's not scary at all. The puppies agree

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep50
programme.desc: How Can I Find My Friends? - Jess's friends have planned a special surprise but he can't find any of them to find out what it is! How can he find his friends? Hey, that's the Big Question! He finds a trail of Willow's hoof prints but they stop at a puddle. Then they follow a trail of wool from Baa but that stops too. They find a walking haystack but it turns out to be Mimi. Jess is baffled. He can't find anyone else! Mimi helps him realise that he followed clues which led him to her but before Jess can ask her anything else she rushes off. Hmm, thinks Jess, maybe if we follow the clues we found earlier they might lead us to our friends and the special surprise. Jess, Joey and Jinx follow the clues and finds all of their friends waiting for them at a special Follow the Clues surprise picnic! Jess found his friends by following the clues AND he's answered the Big Question! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Olivia Ep17
programme.desc: Olivia's Fashion Show - After attending a disappointing fashion show with Grandma, Olivia designs some fabulous clothes and is determined to put on her own show. Unfortunately, her models (Ian, Francine and Julian) prove to be more difficult to work with than she'd anticipated. It's up to Olivia to think fast and make the fashion show work!

programme.title: Olivia Ep18
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Video - When Father takes an out-of-town business trip, Olivia doesn't want him to miss a thing. She decides to create a video diary, filming her family and classmates' everyday life, which isn't quite as exciting as she'd hoped. So Olivia adds her own touch to the final presentation: a big song and dance finish. Dad is thrilled.

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of itchyfootitis, so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the condition begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire itchy foot clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep49
programme.desc: Why Mole Lives Underground - You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep50
programme.desc: Why Squirrel Gathers Nuts - You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep51
programme.desc: Why Meerkat Is Always On The Look Out - You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep17
programme.desc: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon - The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep31
programme.desc: To Squawk With Love / Lerk Was The Night - Eep & Thunk cheer up Squawk to avoid the first final exam/Eep and Lerk venture to the Garden of Eaten after the Broods spike the Watering Hole

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep17
programme.desc: Chilling Out in Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep49
programme.desc: Lucky and the Girl Who Cried Wolf - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep43
programme.desc: The Dread Pirate Richie / Crush 4U Where RU? - A tech-obsessed Richie struggles to stick to the pirate code. Richie surprises the girls with a robotic boy band -- modeled after Crush 4U!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. programme.desc: The Fast and the Friendliest / Much Achoo About Nothing - Branch is training Keith for the big Flyer Bug Race, but he gets too caught up in his competition with Creek and his protg./ When it appears Mr. Dinkles has developed an allergy to Biggie, Biggie must find a solution fast.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep35
programme.desc: Clover / The Moss - A lucky clover offers to help Twig for a day, but once hes had a taste of good fortune, Twig has a hard time letting go. / Leaf gets obsessed with watching the lives of the microbes that live in Rocksys moss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep53
programme.desc: Second To One - The Bloodwolf's been defeated, and all seems right in San Lorenzo. Puss, no longer the No. 1 hero and protector, gets restless and tries on a new hat.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep1
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 1 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object filled with secrets during their search for Dagur the Deranged.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. Or might running around be the trick to getting them all toasty warm?

programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep426
programme.desc: The Biggest Muddy Puddle in the World - Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep117
programme.desc: A Very Busy Afternoon - Froga organises a gathering to share jam sandwiches with everyone, Ron and Christopher want to show off their acrobatic frisbee skills, Bubu invents a new game he wants to teach his friends - all at the same time!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Four-Leaf Clover - Anna and her friends have organized a hula hoop competition and Froga relies on her four-leaf clover to help her win! But when she loses it, Froga is convinced there is no way she'll ever win.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep816
programme.desc: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse - Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger / Pups Save A Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Scout's Honor - Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Busy Buddies - Bossy and Turtle overtask themselves when they take on all class jobs at once.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Roll With It - Bossy gets a new board game and forces his friends to keep playing.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale / The Pirate Painter - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern. // When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep226
programme.desc: Bad News Pirates - When an enchanted baseball stadium appears, our heroes and villains must learn to play as a team in order to win a treasure.

programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Magic Word - Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Scout's Honor - Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. // When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep205
programme.desc: Whale of a Tale - When whales start to pile up in Caracole Cove, Santi and crew must stop the noisy undersea disruption to their usual migration pattern.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep512
programme.desc: The Mechanic Team! - Blaze stops into Gabby's Garage for a quick repair - just as she gets an alert! Three far-flung trucks need her mechanical know-how! So, Blaze and AJ volunteer to help her take her garage on the go!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it. // It's Father's Day but how will Toq let her Dad know she is thinking of him all the way up in Space? Maybe the Browns can help?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Tickety's Big Musical Morning - Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Deer Squad S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure - Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! // The crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure, but when the boys fall asleep it's up to the girls to save the day!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: The Magic Word - Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Scout's Honor - Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Together - Dipsy and Laa-Laa drive to the Hidey Hup in the Tubby Car. They meet Tinky Winky and Po and the Teletubbies go on the Tubby Uppy Downy together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Lion - Dee encourages a friend to say lion and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Howdy There Hooper - The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Funny Bones - Lofty has a broken finger, so Mustard goes in search of help. Messy and friends save the day and discover that bones are amazing.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Silence for Stan - When Stan is sick and resting in bed, Monty tries to find a quiet game to play but wonders if all the best games are noisy.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Baby Race - Mum reminisces about Bluey and Judo as babies. Bluey learnt to roll over first, but Judo was the first to crawl, so then it became a race to see who was going to walk first.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep51
programme.desc: The Teddy Bear Badge - The dog and the squirrels take their teddy bears out for a picnic. However, they soon spot a huge teddy and discover it's Beryl.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep50
programme.desc: The Surprise Badge - The squirrels and Duggee buy Hennie a surprise present for her birthday - but first they need to wrap it up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sewing Badge - Duggee is sewing and makes a snazzy poncho, inspiring the squirrels to make one too. When they hear a very loud sneeze, the group investigates and finds a polar bear with a cold.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Maasai Mara National Park, Kenya - The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.desc: Dunny - Mum bans the girls from saying the word 'dunny' because it's not a word the Queen of England would use, but the kids try and trick her into saying it anyway.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Main Event - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep403UsmanvsBurns
programme.desc: In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes journeys to the Octagon and relive Usmans performance as he cements his place in UFC history.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep12

programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
